Desc.entry: Offers members and interested non-members the chance to meet on regular occasions to network with other like-minded individuals and businesses. These events include a short presentation on topical environmental issues such as legislation and regulations while retaining the business focus. The group has connections and expertise both amongst its members and its steering committee.

Address.entry: Sheffield Chamber of Commerce and Industry

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Last Fri in the month at 7.15am (breakfast meeting except Aug and Dec)
